name: Be the one (itch)
description:
Be number one! Show those other number that they can not look down on you. Show them that you are the ONE! 

Controls: use wasd or arrow keys to control the number one himself. Use your mouse to punch other numbers.

Also playable in the browser at: http://symphoniagames.com/BeTheOne/

Current Dev Highscore: 94 (wave 4)

(Made for trijam #23 in 3 hours)
